name: SpaceScout
description:
Theme of a game - "One Room"

This is my first Game Jam entry and second game in general.

I spend 37 hours on this one but still not enough. 

There's bugfest and tonn of unfinished features, I've tried to hide them. Also afraid that that I made a lot of gramatical mistakes. 

What was used:

- Godot engine with dialogic addon

- Aseprite for grafics

- FL Studio for sound

I was struggling to create a new font but it was hardly readable so I had to use Ohrenstead font. this is the only part which was made not by me.

Description:

The Galactical Empite is at war against the Pirate Union. As a result of numerous battles between the parties, a stable border was formed. You as a freshly graduated Scout Pilot going to a border patrol in your firs day.

Start the engine, enter destination coordinates and go on an adventure
